scripts.my:command: echo Ma premi√®re commande fonctionne && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/Mon_projet/javascriptFeatures/navigation.spec.js'
scripts.cypress:firstTests: npm run allure:clear && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/Mon_projet/javascriptFeatures/firstTests.spec.js' && npm run allure:open
scripts.cypress:firstTests:record: npm run allure:clear && cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/Mon_projet/javascriptFeatures/firstTests.spec.js' --record --key 2972668b-99ba-4407-a9b6-4394883fc4ec && npm run allure:open
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos
scripts.allure:open: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure serve
